titles.title: If You Make The Most High Your Dwelling

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If you make the Most High your dwelling.
If you make the Most High your God.
If you make the Most High your dwelling.
If you make the Most High your God.
You'll not fear the terrors of night;
the pestilence that stalks in the darkness.
Thousands shall fall by your side and at your right hand.
But the Lord will uphold you. Under His wings will enfold you.
By His hands He will lead you, if you're trusting Him.
If you're trusting in Him.
